content.text: Hey, I'm (User 1's name). What's your name?
Hi, I'm (User 2's name).
What are you into?
I like to watch South Park, listen to Avenged Sevenfold, and play baseball.
I like rap music and just bought a new pair of sneakers. I also love ergonomic keyboards and chairs.
That's cool. I've never really been into rap music, but I'm glad you're enjoying it. What's your favorite rap song?
I like a lot of different rap songs, but I'm really into "Go Hard" by Jay-Z and Kanye West right now.
I've heard that song before. It's pretty good.
What's your favorite band?
My favorite band is Avenged Sevenfold. I love their music and their live shows are always amazing.
I've never heard of them before. What kind of music do they play?
They're a metal band. They're a little bit different from other metal bands, but they're really good.
I'll have to check them out.
You should. I'm sure you'll like them.
So, what do you do for a living?
I'm a baseball announcer. I've been doing it for about five years now.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to be a baseball announcer.
It's a lot of fun. I get to watch baseball games for a living and talk about them on the air.
That's amazing. I'm so jealous.
Well, it's not all fun and games. It can be a lot of work, but it's definitely worth it.
I'm sure it is.
So, what do you do for a living?
I'm a software engineer. I've been doing it for about three years now.
That's cool. I've always thought about getting into software engineering.
It's a good field. It's a lot of fun and it pays well.
That's what I've heard.
So, what's your favorite thing to do in your free time?
I like to watch South Park, listen to Avenged Sevenfold, and play baseball.
I like rap music and just bought a new pair of sneakers. I also love ergonomic keyboards and chairs.
That's cool. I've never really been into rap music, but I'm glad you're enjoying it. What's your favorite rap song?
